text:
Las Vegas, NV - Zappos.com - Sr. Mobile Web Developer (node.js)

Full job description and to apply: http://jobvite.com/m?3eJgTfwQ

Come work with me on the next evolution of the Zappos mobile web experience. Full time position on site in Las Vegas, NV (a city that offers so much more than the strip!) with benefits, excellent equipment and a great work environment.
